answerText: John Updike [10] The best-known of those "same guy[s]" is this protagonist of a quartet of Updike novels, a former high school basketball star who both cheats on and is cheated on by his wife Janice.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | UC Irvine and Michigan State A | 1 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In a review of this author's Toward the End of Time, David Foster Wallace claims that this man's protagonists "are basically all the same guy," and gives such examples as "Uncle Nunc" from Roger's Version.  [10] Name this contemporary American author of such short stories as "Who Made Roses Yellow?" and "A Trillion Feet of Gas."
